alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Franklin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 08 at 11:50AM EDT until April 09 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Freeze Watch, freezing temperatures near 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...Franklin, Dauphin, Lebanon, Cumberland, Adams, York and Lancaster Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 10 AM EDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rural, valley locations and sheltered areas will experience the coldest temperatures.
info.instruction: Take protective measures now as freezing temperatures could damage or kill tender plants and vegetation. Potted plants should be brought inside. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
